text: David Alexander Cospatrick Douglas-Home, 15th Earl of Home (; 20 November 1943 â€“ 22 August 2022) was a British businessman and hereditary peer. He was a Conservative member of the House of Lords from 1996 until his death in 2022. He was born in London. His father was Prime Minister Alec Douglas-Home. Home died on 22 August 2022 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Conservative members of the House of Lords Category:Businesspeople from London Category:United Kingdom Earls
title: David Douglas-Home, 15th Earl of Home
